General.Name: Leoch International Technology Limited
General.Description: Leoch International Technology Limited, an investment holding company, develops, manufactures, and sells lead acid batteries in the People's Republic of China, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, and Asia-Pacific region. It primarily offers reserve power, SLI, and motive power batteries, such as AGM VRLA, VRLA-GEL, pure lead, UPS high rate, start-stop, automotive, motorcycle, golf cart, and electric vehicle batteries. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Leoch International Technology Limited is a subsidiary of Master Alliance Investment Limited.
